content: **height ** 11 5 standing **skill level ** intermediate his scales shimmer like stardust and flames dance in his eyes dante will ignite your imagination and breathe warmth into every adventure **supplies** * 3 5mm e hook * 15mm safety eyes * stitch markers * yarn needle * scissors * straight pins * fiber fill * disappearing ink marker optional * shot glass for tracing optional * hot glue gun for filling horns optional **yarn acrylic weight 4 - 447 total yards** * green - 245 yards red heart super saver - spring green * blue - 174 yards maximum value - medium blue * yellow - 11 yards red heart super saver - saffron * white - 11 yards mary maxim starlette - white * orange optional - 2 yards premier basix - goldenrod * red optional - 4 yards mary maxim starlette - cardinal
